name: 7th International Conference on Recycling and Waste Management
content: Recycling 2019 would gather renowned researchers, scientists, professors, industrialist, business associates from all around the world to unfold their current research work in the field of Recycling and Waste Management. This conference will be a global dais for exchanging knowledge, to learn from experts belonging to dynamic fields associated to Recycling and Waste Management. The event for two days will comprise of keynote talks, oral, video presentations, workshops, poster presentations and a variety of more such happenings to make this conference a productive event. The aim of this conference is in bringing up the new technological developments among the global participants, so that this will help in creating a world devoid of waste and a better place for human survival. This conference comprises of 20 different session tracks covering most of the branches of Recycling and Waste Management and will give a diversified option to the participants to place their views on the subject matter of their choice. With collaboration and good team work at the Recycling 2019 we anticipate to end the conference with a striking note of success in instigating Recycling and Waste Management to a next level in the global scenario.
